name: Bald Man Tale
description:
Bald Man Tale is a top-down hack n slash game, where you play a bald man, who is trying to survive in this unfair world. Game contains such features as dialogues, combat system, multiple enemies, and even boss fight!

It is the very first game i've managed to finish, originally was created for russian game jam "Two Weeks Game". 

Engine: Unity

Music: cojam.ru

Development period: 2 weeks  + ~2 days.
